page.title: 17Children's Pets.
page.content: We did a test to find the most popular pet in the school.There are twelve classes in our school in each class there is a avarage of 31 children. We found out that the most popular pet in the school was fish.83 people in the school own fish.The least popular pet in the school is a rat only one person in the school has a rat.17.1% of the children in the school have not got any pets.The second least popular pet is a gerbil. Only four people in the school own gerbils.The second most populer pet is a dog.72 people in the school own dogs.Nearly 1/4 of the children in the school own dogs.1/7 of the chidren in the school own a rabbit.Nearly 1/5 of the children in the school own a cat.So most of the children keep pets of one sort or another.
